/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, its vast expanse visible in the background, adding depth to the scene. The sun shines brightly, its rays filtering through the leaves of the trees and casting a kaleidoscope of light and shadow on the street below. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's architectural charm and natural beauty.
